scripts.dev: set NODE_ENV=dev && set BOT=all && tsx watch src/start.bot.ts
scripts.telegram: set NODE_ENV=dev && set BOT=telegram && tsx watch src/start.bot.ts
scripts.discord: set NODE_ENV=dev && set BOT=discord && tsx watch src/start.bot.ts
scripts.builded: set NODE_ENV=prod && set BOT=all && node dist/start.bot.js
scripts.start: set NODE_ENV=prod && pnpm run build && pnpm run builded
